summary: The Healthy Poultry Assistance and Indemnification Act of 2025 amends the Animal Health Protection Act to provide financial compensation to poultry farmers and layer facilities within designated control areas. This compensation covers income lost due to restrictions on poultry production during the control period, calculated based on the facility's average income from previous flocks, and is subject to certain limitations and exclusions. The bill aims to support poultry farmers impacted by animal health crises.
